com.server.command

Class DefendCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.server.command.ComparableCommand
      • com.server.command.DefendCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ComparableCommand>

    public class DefendCommand
extends ComparableCommand
    Allows a character to defend itself in combat... or if he wants to feel more secure about him/her self
    Author:
    taylor
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
